info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 6:28PM EDT until June 22 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MONROE...SOUTHWESTERN GREENE...NORTHWESTERN MONONGALIA...WETZEL...MARSHALL AND NORTHWESTERN MARION COUNTIES... At 628 PM EDT, a cluster of severe thunderstorm was centered near Powhatan Point, or 9 miles northeast of New Martinsville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Moundsville, New Martinsville, Powhatan Point, Pine Grove, Hundred, Jacksonburg, Clarington, Smithfield, Cameron, New Freeport, Grove Oak, and Woodlands. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
